title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Discover quick and comprehensive answers to common questions about our platform, services, and features.

items.question: How much space do I need for the photo booth?
items.answer: We typically require a space of about 8x8 feet with access to a power outlet. Do not worry — our team will guide you on setup to ensure a perfect fit.

items.question: Can I customise the print with my event theme or logo?
items.answer: Absolutely! We can design prints to match your colors, add your logo, or even include a special message or hashtag.

items.question: How long does it take to set up the photo booth?
items.answer: Setup usually takes 30 to 45 minutes. We arrive early so everything is ready before your event begins.

items.question: Do guests get digital copies of their photos?
items.answer: Yes! Guests can instantly receive their photos via QR code, text, or email, and you will also get a full digital gallery after the event.

items.question: Why is the Premium version worth the higher price?
items.answer: Because it transforms your booth into a luxury experience—unlimited fun, unforgettable memories, and a professional finish your guests will love.

footer: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team
